data.actual_result: As noted in steps: At no point does Discord switch to the new default sound device, even when the device it is using is disabled by Windows.
data.expected_result: As soon as device B is set to default, Discord should switch audio to device B. Failing that, it should at least update when the device is explicitly disabled.
data.short_description: Discord does not update voice output device when the system default changes.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set device A as default output device. - Set Discord's output to default. - Verify voice chat from device A. - Set device B as default output device. - Reconnect to voice server. - Verify voice chat is still from device A. - Disable device A. - Verify loss of voice output.
